```{=html}
    <div class="hero-particles"></div>
</section>

<!-- CONTACT METHODS SECTION -->
<section class="criteria-section">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="section-header">
            <h2>Contact Directory</h2>
            <p>Please direct your inquiry to the appropriate department to ensure a timely response.</p>
        </div>
        
        <div class="criteria-grid">
            <div class="criteria-card">
                <div class="criteria-icon"><i class="fas fa-envelope-open-text"></i></div>
                <h3>General Inquiries</h3>
                <p>For general questions, feedback, or to share your story.</p>
                <a href="mailto:contact@thedatashrink.com" class="btn btn-primary" style="margin-top: 20px;">Email Us</a>
            </div>
            
            <div class="criteria-card">
                <div class="criteria-icon"><i class="fas fa-microphone-alt"></i></div>
                <h3>Press & Media</h3>
                <p>For interviews, press releases, and media kits.</p>
                <a href="mailto:press@thedatashrink.com" class="btn btn-primary" style="margin-top: 20px;">Email Press</a>
            </div>
            
            <div class="criteria-card">
                <div class="criteria-icon"><i class="fas fa-handshake"></i></div>
                <h3>Licensing & Partnerships</h3>
                <p>To license our music for your project or to discuss brand partnerships.</p>
                <a href="mailto:licensing@thedatashrink.com" class="btn btn-primary" style="margin-top: 20px;">Email Licensing</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>

<!-- CONTACT FORM SECTION -->
<section class="form-section">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="section-header">
            <h2>Send Us a Message</h2>
        </div>
        <form class="submission-form" id="contactForm" style="max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto;">
            <div class="form-grid">
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label for="contactName">Your Name *</label>
                    <input type="text" id="contactName" name="contactName" required>
                </div>
                
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label for="contactEmail">Your Email *</label>
                    <input type="email" id="contactEmail" name="contactEmail" required>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="form-group full-width">
                <label for="subject">Subject *</label>
                <input type="text" id="subject" name="subject" required>
            </div>
            <div class="form-group full-width">
                <label for="message">Message *</label>
                <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="6" required></textarea>
            </div>
            <button type="submit" class="submit-btn" style="width: 100%;">
                <i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i>
                Send Message
            </button>
        </form>
    </div>
</section>

<script>
    document.getElementById('contactForm').addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        const btn = this.querySelector('.submit-btn');
        btn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> Sending...';
        btn.disabled = true;
        // Simulate sending
        setTimeout(() => {
            btn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i> Message Sent!';
            btn.style.background = 'var(--success-green)';
        }, 1500);
    });
</script>
```
